name: Who Done It? (EricaPikaPika)
description:
Controls:

  • Arrow keys to move (can jump too)
  • Click to interact with NPC
  • W to use doors
  • A to shoot water orbs (you start off with 8 water orbs)
  • S to shoot plant orbs (you start off with 8 plant orbs)
  • D to shoot fire orbs (you start off with 8 fire orbs)

-------------------------------------------------------------------------

There's a murderer in town who killed your beloved sensei! It's up to you to figure out who done it. The local town monsters seem to have an idea of who the killer is. Shoot orbs that have an elemental type advantage over the opposing monster to defeat them, and they will either drop more orbs for you to use or a note that hints at the killer's identity. When you have gathered at least 4 hints, click on the Ice NPC to pick out among the townsfolk who the killer is.

Guess who the murderer is correctly, and you win the game! If you guess wrong, or completely run out of orbs, you lose. The killer isn't always the same person every playthrough, so don't go thinking you've already won if you played before...

Game created by Jeanette Mui and Erica Nguyen
